column4: Anyone tell me why when I set my Nvida card about 1360*768 my windows and toolbars get cut off?
the top/bottoms getting cut off? ive a similer issue onmy smaller screen netbook with its 'short' res screen
theres a 'tweak' to allow you to hold down alt and click on a window to move it 'up' past the gnome panel to  let you get to the bottom of the windows
